item.title: Make Payment
item.description: Challenge Solution We urgently need a microservice that can handle payments. So our new intern created one using flask and werkzeug but it seems that our new intern made a mistake. We require your excellent skills to figure out the issue. makePayment.py from flask import Flask, request import hashlib import sqlite3 app = Flask(__name__) @app.route("/pay", methods=['POST']) def handlePay(): connection = sqlite3.connect('database.db') cur = connection.cursor() amount = request.form.get("amount") if not amount: return "Missing amount", 400 userid = request.
